text: John Marcus "Scoot" McNairy (born November 11, 1977) is an American actor. He known for his roles in Monsters, Argo, Killing Them Softly, 12 Years a Slave, Gone Girl, Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice and A Complete Unknown. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Dallas Category:Movie producers from Texas
title: Scoot McNairy
